channel.title: [PI] Achieve items with your 99s
channel.description: On my server my skillcape shop is a bit lagged. Instead of there being a skillcape shop I would like players to get the skillcapes/hoods when they achieve their 99s. How would I go about doing this? All help is Appreciated, Thanks.

item.title: [PI] Achieve items with your 99s
item.dc:creator: @No_Faith No Faith
item.description:
@No_Faith wrote:

On my server my skillcape shop is a bit lagged. Instead of there being a skillcape shop I would like players to get the skillcapes/hoods when they achieve their 99s. How would I go about doing this?
All help is Appreciated, Thanks.
